name: Soulward
description:
Soulward is an ethereal platformer where your one life is also your means of navigation. Just one life, just one weapon.

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Hold Enter and use WASD - Aim shard

Release Enter - Shoot shard

Press Enter - again  after shooting shard to teleport to the shard

"R" Key - Restart

Your shard can be teleported to only when charged. It loses charge after a throw, but is able to gain a charge by hitting an enemy or a wall. 

If you take a hit without the shard in possession you will die.
